site.title: Mina Amrouche - Software Engineer | IMinaIT

hero.subtitle: Founder of IMinaIT
hero.description: Passionate software engineer and founder of IMinaIT, crafting beautiful, scalable applications with modern technologies. I create exceptional user experiences through clean code and thoughtful design.

about.title: About Me & IMinaIT
about.subtitle: Passionate software engineer and founder of IMinaIT with 8+ years of experience creating beautiful, scalable applications and leading development teams.
about.description: I'm the founder of IMinaIT, a software development company specializing in creating beautiful, functional applications. My journey spans from elegant frontend experiences with React and Vue.js to robust backend systems, cloud architecture, and team leadership. I'm passionate about creating solutions that not only work flawlessly but also delight users.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern, beautiful, and scalable applications at IMinaIT

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.subtitle: Building innovative solutions and leading development teams with passion and creativity

positions.title: Founder & Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: Founded IMinaIT, leading full-stack development projects, architecting elegant solutions, and mentoring junior developers. Specialized in React, Vue.js, and cloud infrastructure.
achievements: Reduced application load times by 60% through optimization
Led team of 5 developers using Agile methodologies
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 80%

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: Developed responsive web applications and collaborated with design teams to create exceptional user experiences across various industries.
achievements: Collaborated with UX/UI designers on user-centered design
Implemented modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries
Maintained 95%+ code coverage through comprehensive testing

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of recent work demonstrating technical expertise and creative problem-solving at IMinaIT

items.title: Enterprise Dashboard
items.description: Full-stack analytics platform built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Features real-time data visualization and user management.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Modern e-commerce solution with Vue.js frontend, microservices architecture, and integrated payment processing.

items.title: Mobile-First PWA
items.description: Progressive web application with offline capabilities, push notifications, and native app-like experience across all devices.

contact.title: Let's Create Together
contact.subtitle: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Let's discuss your next project and create something beautiful together with IMinaIT.
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you need a full-stack developer, technical consultant, or creative collaborator, let's connect and explore how IMinaIT can help bring your vision to life.
